products.name: Chocolate Mould
products.description: A chocolate mould is a tool used to shape melted chocolate into various designs or forms. It is usually made of plastic, silicone, or metal. After melting the chocolate, you pour it into the mould and let it cool and harden. Once it sets, you can remove the shaped chocolate from the mould.
